```{r tab1follow, cache=cacheon}

tabfollow <- print(CreateTableOne(
  vars = c("scream_aid1yr", "scream_aid3yr"),
  data = rsdata,
  strata = "scream_aid"
),
missing = TRUE, printToggle = FALSE, nonnormal = tabvars,
catDigits = 1, contDigits = 1,
noSpaces = TRUE,
explain = FALSE,
test = FALSE
)

tabfollow <- as_tibble(cbind(Variable = rownames(tabfollow), tabfollow)) %>%
  select(Variable, Missing, `A-/ID-`:`A+/ID+`) %>%
  mutate(Variable = sanitize_text(Variable))

default_kable(tabfollow,
  font_size = 6,
  caption = "Follow-up A/ID",
  longtable = TRUE,
  escape = FALSE
) %>%
  landscape()
```
